bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
https://github.com/ofiwg/libfabric/releases https://github.com/ofiwg/libfabric/releases/download/v1.4.0rc2/libfabric-1.4.0rc2.tar.bz2
Please rebase lifabric to latest upstream release. fabtests depends on it.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
How reproducible: always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. 322 /bin/sh ./libtool --tag=CC --mode=link gcc -g -Wall -D_GNU_SOURCE -D 'CONFIG_PATH="/usr/share/fabtests"' -I./include -O2 -g -pipe -Wall -Werror=format-security -Wp,-D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 -fexceptions -fstack-protec tor-strong --param=ssp-buffer-size=4 -grecord-gcc-switches -specs=/usr/lib/rpm/redhat/redhat-hardened-cc1 - m64 -mtune=generic -Wl,-z,relro -specs=/usr/lib/rpm/redhat/redhat-hardened-ld -o simple/fi_rdm_rma_simple simple/rdm_rma_simple.o libfabtests.la -lfabric 323 ./.libs/libfabtests.a(shared.o): In function `ft_init_alias_ep': 324 /builddir/build/BUILD/fabtests-1.4.0rc1/common/shared.c:655: undefined reference to `fi_ep_alias' 325 collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status 326 make[1]: *** [Makefile:960: simple/fi_msg] Error 1 327 make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs.... 328 ./.libs/libfabtests.a(shared.o): In function `ft_init_alias_ep':
2. ~/upstream/libfabric$ git log --no-walk --tags --pretty="%h %d %s" --decorate=full 6728066 (tag: refs/tags/v1.4.0rc2) release 1.4.0rc2 02a250d (tag: refs/tags/v1.4.0rc1) release 1.4.0rc1 93c095d (tag: refs/tags/v1.3.0) Merge pull request #1955 from jsquyres/pr/v1.3.0/news-date-updated
3.
~/upstream/libfabric$ glo 93c095d..02a250d 02a250d release 1.4.0rc1 8a9499c Merge pull request #2422 from bturrubiates/pr/fi-friendly-info ............... 5849e17 Add fi_ep_alias <-- This commit is needed. ...............
Actual results:
Expected results:
Additional info:

https://github.com/ofiwg/libfabric/releases/download/v1.4.0/libfabric-1.4.0.tar.bz2
Please build 1.4.0 as it is available now. Thanks
libfabric-1.4.0-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-8322e2cbc5

libfabric-1.4.0-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-8322e2cbc5
This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 26 development cycle. Changing version to '26'.
libfabric-1.4.1-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-480e39b508

libfabric-1.4.1-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-480e39b508
libfabric-1.4.1-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
